main event: An unidentified lighted flying object was observed from Sandia Base on 13 March 1949.
interesting points: The object was described as a bell shape with a tail of fire., The object appeared to be about half the size of the full moon., The color of the object was noted as blue-white or greenish-white with a white center., The object trailed a flaming tail approximately twice the length of its body., The observation was made under clear skies and moderate moonlight.
witness description: Recruit Bill Nanny and Pfc Robert Espino, both on sentry post.
